definition: A term used to describe someone who has managed to endure and come out alive from a challenging or life-threatening situation. This word is commonly used to refer to individuals who have survived against all odds.

examples.english: They are the only ones surviving

examples.german: Er kam überlebend aus dem Krieg zurück
examples.english: He returned from the war alive

examples.german: Die überlebenden Pflanzen erholten sich schnell
